column4: Have installed Apache 2.0.54 to my Breezy.  Default setup doesnt look like a standard one. Im havning troubble finding the right config file. Any suggestions? Atm i can see something when webbrowsing but i cant locate this "index.html" showing
where are you looking for the config?
lol, well that's where it normally si for me too.. did you build it yourself? the ./configure has options for you to specify which type of file placement you want.
